attributes.action: make everyone on the dole work for their money if they are fully able to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People on the dole are on the whole fully able workers and I believe that they should be made to work for their money. Jobs could include street cleaners or binmen. Why pay them to do nothing?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
